name: Hangings for a Bed (Lit à la duchesse)
description: Hangings for a Bed (Lit à la duchesse); Unknown; France; about 1690 - 1715; Silk satin with applied sections of silk lamps; embroidery and trim of silver, silver-wrapped silk thread, silk cord, and silk floss; linen and bast linings; wool padding; paper; 415.9 x 181.6 x 182.9 cm (163 3/4 x 71 1/2 x 72 in.); 79.DD.3; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Hangings for a Bed (Lit à la duchesse)
medium: Silk satin with applied sections of silk lamps; embroidery and trim of silver, silver-wrapped silk thread, silk cord, and silk floss; linen and bast linings; wool padding; paper
